name: PLA
description: Polylactic acid, biodegradable, easy to use, with low heat resistance

name: ABS
description: Acrylonitrile Butadiene Styrene, durable, with better heat resistance than PLA

name: PETG
description: Polyethylene Terephthalate Glycol-modified, combines ease of PLA printing with the durability of ABS

name: TPU
description: Thermoplastic Polyurethane, flexible and impact resistant

name: Nylon
description: Wear-resistant and chemical resistant, but difficult to print

name: PC
description: Polycarbonate, extremely durable and high heat resistant, but complex to print

name: PVA
description: Polyvinyl Alcohol, often used as a support material because it is water soluble

name: HIPS
description: High Impact Polystyrene, similar to ABS and often used as a support material

name: ASA
description: Acrylonitrile Styrene Acrylate, similar to ABS but with better UV and weather resistance

name: Composite
description: Materials mixed with fibers such as carbon or glass to enhance certain properties
